name: Neon Dimensions
description:
Neon Dimensions

Neon Dimensions is a game that I created in 1 week as a game development challenge. The purpose of it is to help me in creating and finishing projects and then being able to release them. I have done another game development challenge where I created a game in 30 minutes and then released it on Android phones!

Neon Dimensions is a 3D Sci-fi puzzle game. There are 5 levels that progressively increase in difficulty. To help you along your way, there is a robot called Mr. Willy that helps you figure out what you need to do in each level to complete it!

In preparation for the release of Neon Dimensions, I have also created a Youtube video outlining how I was able to make this game in 1 week! Here is the link if you want to check it out:

Neon Dimensions is completely free to download although it would be much appreciated for donations if you want to see more game development challenges in the future!
